summary: While working on a TV show in Los Angeles, famed Australian stuntman Grant Page helps an up-and-coming fantasy-themed rock band develop special effects and dangerous stunts for their act.
cast: Grant Page|Monique van de Ven|Margaret Gerard|Paul Haynes|Curtis Hyde|Greg Magie|Smokey Huff|Richie King|Perry Morris|Doug Loch|Richard Blackburn|Ron Raley|Chris Chalen|T.J. Shaner|Barbra Paskin|Lawrence D. Feinberg|Barbara S. Edelstein|Douglas Farren|Phil Hartman|Jeff Michalski|Yana Nirvana|Bob Perlow|Francine Selkirk|Rick McCullough|Peter Armstrong|Dale Aspin|Max Aspin|Warren Campbell|Frank Lennon|Rangi Nikora|Tom Slaven|Brian Trenchard-Smith
keywords: grauman's chinese theatre los angeles|ozploitation|rock concert|happy ending|stuntman as protagonist
title: Stunt Rock
